statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_outcome FROM clinical_trials WHERE treatment = 'Medication A';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, treatment FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_age > 50 AND treatment = 'Drug A' ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM clinical_trials WHERE treatment_outcome = 'Successful' ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_id, patient_age FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 30 AND 50
SELECT DISTINCT treatment FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY treatment DESC
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_id IN (1, 5, 10) AND treatment_outcome = 'Unsuccessful'
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentOutcomes WHERE outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT patient_id, name, dob FROM Patients ORDER BY dob ASC;
SELECT treatment, outcome, date_conducted FROM TreatmentOutcomes WHERE date_conducted BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT name, age, dob FROM Patients WHERE dob BETWEEN '1970-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT p.name, t.treatment, t.outcome FROM Patients p JOIN TreatmentOutcomes t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id WHERE t.outcome = 'Successful' ORDER BY p.name ASC;
SELECT p.name, p.age, t.treatment, t.outcome, t.date_conducted FROM Patients p LEFT JOIN TreatmentOutcomes t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id WHERE p.age < 30 AND t.date_conducted < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE outcome LIKE '%successful%';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE ethnicity = 'Asian';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE phase = 3 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE outcome = 'Successful' AND treatment_type = 'Medication' ORDER BY treatment_date ASC
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date, phase FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND end_date <= '2024-12-31' ORDER BY start_date
SELECT patient_name, ethnicity FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE treatment_type = 'Surgery' ORDER BY patient_name ASC, treatment_date DESC

SELECT * FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id JOIN clinical_trials ON treatments.treatment_date = clinical_trials.start_date WHERE outcome LIKE '%Positive%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC, trial_name ASC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE race = 'Caucasian';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM trials WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM treatments WHERE cost < 1000 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, race FROM patients WHERE race='Asian' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE cost BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM trials WHERE status='ongoing' ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT p.patient_name, t.treatment_name, o.outcome_description FROM patients p JOIN outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id JOIN treatments t ON t.treatment_id = o.trial_id ORDER BY p.patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, age, enrollment_date FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN outcomes ON patients.patient_id = outcomes.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, enrollment_date FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender='Female' ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;

SELECT t.treatment_name, tp.enrollment_date, p.patient_name FROM treatments t JOIN trial_patients tp ON t.treatment_id = tp.treatment_id JOIN patients p ON tp.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE t.cost > 500;
SELECT tr.trial_name, COUNT(tp.patient_id) as num_patients FROM trials tr JOIN trial_patients tp ON tr.trial_id = tp.trial_id GROUP BY tr.trial_name ORDER BY num_patients DESC;
